scripts.first-launch: fly apps destroy fly-tcoder-ffmpeg-worker-31657fa --yes 2>/dev/null || true && fly apps create fly-tcoder-ffmpeg-worker-31657fa && fly deploy --build-only
scripts.secrets:setup: echo 'Run: fly secrets set UPSTASH_REDIS_REST_URL=... UPSTASH_REDIS_REST_TOKEN=... R2_ACCOUNT_ID=... R2_ACCESS_KEY_ID=... R2_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=... R2_OUTPUT_BUCKET_NAME=...'
scripts.machines:destroy-all: fly machines list --json | jq -r '.[].id' | xargs -I {} fly machine destroy {} --force
scripts.test:local: docker build -t fly-ffmpeg-test . && docker run --rm --env-file ../.env fly-ffmpeg-test
